sentence.Network_en: Jerry had a big soup strainer that he was very proud of.
sentence.Network_cn: 杰里长了一副他颇为自豪的大胡须.

sentence.Network_en: I started with the Viennese speciality frittatensuppe, or pancake soup.
sentence.Network_cn: 我吃的第一道菜是维也纳特色菜鸡蛋饼汤，也叫炒饼汤。

sentence.Network_en: Drain the beans thoroughly and save the stock for soup.
sentence.Network_cn: 将豆角彻底控干，并把滤出的豆汁留下做汤。

auth_sentence.content: I'll just go and heat up the soup.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'll just go and heat up the soup.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'll just go and heat up the soup.

auth_sentence.content: Ladle in the soup and garnish with chopped chives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ladle in the soup and garnish with chopped chives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ladle in the soup and garnish with chopped chives.

auth_sentence.content: Serve with the chilled soup and caramelised watermelon chunks.
auth_sentence.res_content: Serve with the chilled soup and caramelised watermelon chunks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Serve with the chilled soup and caramelised watermelon chunks.
